metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10772 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12662 was shipped for Unbound in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7, as part of erratum RHSA-2020:2414. Vulnerable versions of Unbound could still amplify an incoming query into a large number of queries directed to a target, even with a lower amplification ratio compared to versions of Unbound that shipped before the mentioned erratum. This issue is about the incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12662, and it does not affect upstream versions of Unbound.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this is an issue in a Red Hat backport

criterions.comment: unbound: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
